TextAreaProps.name: error
TextAreaProps.description:
Controls the error state of the `TextArea`, changing the
background color and border colors to red

TextAreaProps.name: resize
TextAreaProps.description: Controls the resize rules for the `TextArea`

TextAreaProps.name: variant
TextAreaProps.deprecated:
The `variant` prop has been deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Please use the `error` boolean prop instead.

**Before**

`<TextArea variant="error" />`

**After**

`<TextArea error />`
